external_games.name: Train Simulator: Seaboard GE U36B Loco Add-On

name: Train Simulator 2021: Seaboard GE U36B Loco
summary: The famous General Electric 'U-Boat' comes to Train Simulator 2021 in two distinctive Seaboard liveries. General Electric introduced its "Universal Series" diesel road-switchers in 1959, and over the following two decades more than 3,500 "U-Boats" - as the locomotives were nicknamed - were constructed.
